ingredients.ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Cook pasta until just al dente; it will soften slightly as it sits in the dressing
Rinse cooled pasta lightly to prevent clumping without washing away all starch
Make the salad a few hours ahead so flavors meld together
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a straightforward, make-ahead salad perfect for gatherings. Help users understand pasta doneness for a dish that will continue sitting in dressing, and how the balance of acidic vinegar and creamy mayo creates a satisfying dressing.
